response.overview: Resistere a Roma is a documentary short film by director Giuseppe Ferrara, produced by the Ferranti Group, focusing on the Roman resistance movement during the tragic German occupation of Rome. The documentary focuses its attention above all on the dynamics of the attack in via Rasella, to which the Germans reacted with the massacre of the Fosse Ardeatine. It was presented in Venice during the 1966 Documentary Exhibition.
response.tagline: Documentary short film by director Giuseppe Ferrara, produced by the Ferranti Group, focusing on the Roman resistance movement during the tragic German occupation of Rome
response.title: Resisting in Rome
